instructions: Image titled Add Favorites to Your iPhone Step 1 1 Open the Phone app. It's a green app that contains a white phone icon and is typically found on your home screen. Image titled Add Favorites to Your iPhone Step 2 2 Tap . It's a star-shaped icon in the lower-left corner of the screen. Image titled Add Favorites to Your iPhone Step 3 3 Tap . It's in the upper-left corner of the screen. Image titled Add Favorites to Your iPhone Step 4 4 Tap a contact. Choose a contact you'd like to add to your "Favorites" list. Image titled Add Favorites to Your iPhone Step 5 5 Tap the number you'd like to add. Select one from the following: Message for their primary text messaging number. Call for the contact's primary voice number. Video for the contact's primary FaceTime ID. Add a second number to "Favorites" by repeating these steps. Advertisement

Image titled Add Favorites to Your iPhone Step 6 1 Open the Phone app. It's a green app that contains a white phone icon and is typically found on your home screen. Image titled Add Favorites to Your iPhone Step 7 2 Tap . It's a star-shaped icon in the lower-left corner of the screen. Image titled Add Favorites to Your iPhone Step 8 3 Tap . It's in the upper-right corner of the screen. Image titled Add Favorites to Your iPhone Step 9 4 Tap and hold next to a contact. Doing so allows you to drag a contact up or down on the screen to rearrange the order of your "Favorites". Image titled Add Favorites to Your iPhone Step 10 5 Tap next to a contact. Do this to remove a contact from your "Favorites". Tap Delete to confirm deletion. Image titled Add Favorites to Your iPhone Step 11 6 Tap . It's in the upper-right corner of the screen. Now you've edited your contacts. Advertisement

Image titled Change Which Apps Have Access to Your HomeKit Data on an iPhone Step 5 1 Press the Home button. It's the round button on the face of your iPhone. This returns you to the home screen. Image titled Add Favorites to Your iPhone Step 13 2 Swipe right. Do so from anywhere on the home screen. This opens the "Today" page in Notification Center. Image titled Add Favorites to Your iPhone Step 14 3 Scroll down and tap . It's below all the other content. Image titled Add Favorites to Your iPhone Step 15 4 Scroll down and tap . Tap the white plus sign in the green circle next to "Favorites." Image titled Add Favorites to Your iPhone Step 16 5 Scroll to the top of the page. Image titled Add Favorites to Your iPhone Step 17 6 Tap and hold next to a widget. Doing so allows you to drag a widget up or down on the screen to rearrange the order. Widgets higher on the list will appear closer to the top of the Notification Center. Image titled Add Favorites to Your iPhone Step 18 7 Tap . It's in the upper-right corner of the screen. The Favorites widget will now appear in the "Today" page of Notification Center. Swipe right from the home screen and tap a contact in the Favorites widget to immediately dial or message them.
